items.title: Show QuickStrip when Windows starts
items.body: Do you want the QuickStrip to be visible automatically each time Windows starts up.

items.title: Hide QuickStrip if click elsewhere?
items.body: Do you want the QuickStrip to auto-hide if user clicks anywhere outside of the QuickStrip or MORE panels? (If NO then QuickStrip stays open until user closes it with close button [X])

items.title: Buttons on the QuickStrip and MORE PANEL for Site
items.body: Determines which buttons will be displayed, and in which order, on the QuickStrip and MORE panels for your site. Customize this setting to control the functionality that is available to your users at your site.

items.title: Save Error Message - when not keyed in.
items.body: This defines the message that is displayed to the user when they click the Save button when they are not signed into Morphic. (NOTE: clicking Reset to Standard button will sign them out of Morphic.)

items.title: QuickFolder Location
items.body: Enter the website that the QuickFolder button should open for your site.

items.title: Shared Logins
items.body: If you have some logins that are shared by different people (e.g. visitor, guest, temp, etc.) then please list them here.  It will prevent people from SAVING settings while logged in using these names -- so that the next user will not experience the settings of the previous user of the shared login name.   You can use actual longin names or patterns like  admin*, guest*, student*, visitor*, volunteer*

title: Settings that are usually not changed, but can be

items.title: Allow Morphic to launch OS settings
items.body: Allow Morphic to open Settings pages and Control Panels of the operating system?

items.title: Force Morphic to use Chrome when opening URLs
items.body: Do you want Morphic to always use the Chrome browser for opening web pages?

items.title: Tooltip Display Delay (in milliseconds)
items.body: Changes the time delay before a tooltip is displayed (when hovering on something in the QuickStrip).

items.title: QuickStrip Scale Factor
items.body: Changes the size of the QuickStrip. Increasing this value makes the QuickStrip bigger.

items.title: Disable "Restart Warnings" for Apps
items.body: Do you want to disable the warning that tells users that they may have to restart their apps in order for a changed settings to be fully applied. For example, this notification is usually displayed for the Language setting.

items.title: Shortcut to open Morphic
items.body: Change the shortcut that opens Morphic. For possible values refer to https://electronjs.org/docs/api/accelerator

items.title: More panel width
items.body: More panel default width

items.title: More panel height
items.body: More panel default height

items.title: Movable More panel
items.body: Can the panel be moved?

items.title: Resizable More panel
items.body: Can the panel be resized?

items.title: Always on top More panel
items.body: Should the panel be always on top?

items.title: Site name
items.body: Unique identifier for the Morphic deployment.

items.title: DocuMorph Executable File Location
items.body: The file path to the DocuMorph executable to use in the QuickStrip document conversion features. DocuMorph is included in the Quickstrip, so you do not need to change this setting. However, you can do so if you wish to use a custom version of DocuMorph.

items.title: ShareX Executable File Location
items.body: The file path to the ShareX executable to capture screenshots. ShareX is included in the Quickstrip, so you do not need to change this setting. However, you can do so if you wish to use a custom version of ShareX.

items.title: Snipping Tool Command
items.body: The path to the Snipping Tools's executable file, used in the service buttons. This uses the internal Windows 10 snipping tool.

items.title: Hide the QSS save button
items.body: Do you want to hide the save button?

items.title: Disable error dialogs
items.body: Do you want to hide any error message? Take into account that you won't get any error displayed, even if it's critical, use it at your own risk.

items.title: Survey triggers
items.body: URL to the the place serving the survey triggers data. Note that it should return triggers in JSON format.

items.title: 4 state Morphic switch
items.body: 4 state Morphic switch. This is read by the service and determines which components do you want to start, it follows the folloing convention: "<morphic>:<metrics>.". (eg, "on:on"=both on (default), "off:on"=metrics only).

items.title: Auto login user id
items.body: The source where Morphic should look for the username.

items.title: Morphic tray type
items.body: The type of widget to use in the task bar - "gpii.app.trayButton", "gpii.app.trayIcon", or both.

items.title: System default language
items.body: The code of OS default language `gpii-app` (it might be the one with which the system was installed with). This language should always stay on top of the "Language" setting's menu list. The code must be exactly matching one of the installed languages' code (with respect to the region). In case the selected language code is missing, there simply won't be a special first setting. NOTE: this is not related to the default language value defined for the language setting
